summary: The heir to a huge fortune is presumed drowned, then shows up, is then murdered.
cast: Warner Oland|Rosina Lawrence|Charles Quigley|Henrietta Crosman|Edward Trevor|Astrid Allwyn|Herbert Mundin|Jonathan Hale|Egon Brecher|Gloria Roy|Ivan Miller|Arthur Edmund Carewe|William Bailey|Francis Ford|Bud Geary|Chuck Hamilton|James T. Mack|Jerry Miley|Landers Stevens|Brick Sullivan
title: Charlie Chan's Secret
